Name: Rusty To The Core
Ingredients: 45 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
7.5 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Honeyed herbal whisky liqueur with an apple brandy base, freshened with lemon juice and given a wisp of smokiness by a splash of Islay malt.
History: Created in 2010 by Julian de Feral at Lutyens Bar in London, England for his autumn menu.
Nutrition: One serving of Rusty To The Core contains 211 calories
